actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-343.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3398, a bill to amend the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 relating to increases in the target prices of the 1979 crops of wheat, corn, and other crops under certain circumstances, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3398 (Target prices of 1979 agriculture crops).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3398, a bill to amend the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 relating to increases in the target prices of the 1979 crops of wheat, corn, and other crops under certain circumstances, and for other purposes.
